alert.note: Alert for Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 20 at 8:57PM CDT until May 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Minnesota... Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. For the Mississippi River...including Lake City, Wabasha, Alma Dam 4, Winona, La Crosse, Lansing, McGregor, Guttenberg Dam 10... flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Wabasha. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river affects low lying areas. At 12.5 feet, Flooding occurs in the field west of the grocery store on Hiawatha Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
